name: places/ChIJM_CRhBhZwokRmTmkDj4MpV8
formattedAddress: 1590 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1590 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: I ordered the molten chocolate cake off GrubHub and it's such a cute idea I was really impressed. The cake itself taste so bad, it tastes like brown cardboard or what I imagine military rations taste like. And the ice cream is just that cheap cup that used to come in school lunches. I wouldn't eat this again even if it were free. Not even the coffee was good.

originalText.text: I have a mixed review because the first time I went here, it was great, but the second time around, not so much. I'll say this: tho, my first time here, the desserts was a bit of what I assume the desserts if any that heaven will be serving. With every bite, I felt all my troubles and worries melting away. So I was surprised that my second time around wasn't as thrilling. It was nowhere near as fascinating and flabbergasting as the first time. I felt ripped off, especially having to take a cab to get there and back home. I would recommend one or two, but I can't say you'll have that same mind-blowing experience as I did, and that wouldn't be fair to you. However, I'll give my two cents anyway and say go for the carrot cake or biscotti on a great day. The two are just mind-blowing. With that icing, you'll get from off the top of the carrot cake (ü§§) to the crust at the bottom of that biscotti. (üòÆ‚Äçüí®) it was the best dessert I had in quite some time. I'm now realizing there is something with apples and salted caramel in it, which is a huge surprise to me. I wasn't told about this when I was there ü§îüßêü§®. Nevertheless, everyone has their own taste, so my taste won't necessarily be to your liking, but when it comes to desserts, is there truly a yours or mine taste buds? I think desserts are universal, and if it's not good for one, it won't be good for all, but that's just my take on it. It's definitely worth the try. As far as their pizza goes, I'm not a fan. I haven't tried anything else, so I'll zip my lip in regards to that, but enjoy! I hope you get em on a great day like I did.

originalText.text: Placed a web order for the chocolate mouse for my wife's birthday. Mouse is her favorite dessert and locally available options are slim. The desserts came expertly packed and were a huge hit.

text.text: Placed a web order for the chocolate mouse for my wife's birthday. Mouse is her favorite dessert and locally available options are slim. The desserts came expertly packed and were a huge hit.

originalText.text:
UPDATE: gave it another try and I am sold on the creamy chocolate mousse. The mousse is whipped to perfection as it is fluffy and light. The chocolate flavor tastes natural with no additives. The tiramisu flavor is still a must try, but the biscotti crust cheesecake was too decadent and underwhelming in taste.

REVIEW FROM 10 MONTHS AGO (3 stars rating): tasty and not overly sweet cheesecakes in a jar. I liked the tiramisu flavor the most. The original flavor had an unnatural taste to it. I didn't like how the cannoli was presented, but it was delicious.

text.text:
UPDATE: gave it another try and I am sold on the creamy chocolate mousse. The mousse is whipped to perfection as it is fluffy and light. The chocolate flavor tastes natural with no additives. The tiramisu flavor is still a must try, but the biscotti crust cheesecake was too decadent and underwhelming in taste.

REVIEW FROM 10 MONTHS AGO (3 stars rating): tasty and not overly sweet cheesecakes in a jar. I liked the tiramisu flavor the most. The original flavor had an unnatural taste to it. I didn't like how the cannoli was presented, but it was delicious.

originalText.text:
I've been ordering from here for the last few years, and I can't say enough good things about them! Their Key Lime pie is an absolutely amazing, and it's just one of the many incredible deserts they offer.

Tonight, I encountered a hiccup with my Uber Eats order, and I decided to give them a call. Charles, from their team, was incredibly responsive. He promptly called me back and efficiently resolved the issue over the phone. That level of customer support is truly exceptional and speaks volumes about the dedication of the team at Harlem Baking Company.

This place has consistently delivered not only delicious baked goods but also top-notch customer service. I wholeheartedly recommend everyone to order from them. I know I'll continue to do so for many more years to come!
